Uses of Package
zipkin.storage

  • Packages that use zipkin.storage 
    Package Description
    zipkin.collector  
    zipkin.storage  
  • Classes in zipkin.storage used by zipkin.collector 
    Class and Description
    Callback
    A callback of a single result or error.
    StorageComponent
    A component that provides storage interfaces used for spans and aggregations.
  • Classes in zipkin.storage used by zipkin.storage 
    Class and Description
    AsyncSpanConsumer
    Spans are created in instrumentation, transported out-of-band, and eventually persisted.
    AsyncSpanStore
    An interface that is equivalent to SpanStore but accepts callbacks to allow bridging to async libraries.
    Callback
    A callback of a single result or error.
    InMemorySpanStore
    Internally, spans are indexed on 64-bit trace ID
    InMemoryStorage
    Test storage component that keeps all spans in memory, accepting them on the calling thread.
    InMemoryStorage.Builder 
    QueryRequest
    Invoking this request retrieves traces matching the below filters.
    QueryRequest.Builder 
    SpanStore 
    StorageAdapters.SpanConsumer 
    StorageComponent
    A component that provides storage interfaces used for spans and aggregations.
    StorageComponent.Builder
